function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proprietary firmware for Xbee module may pose security risks and vulnerabilities to the network.","Impact":"Potential data breaches, unauthorized access, and network disruption.","Mitigation":"Regular firmware updates, encryption protocols, and network security measures.","Technologies":"Encryption protocols, firewalls, intrusion detection systems.","People":"Users, network administrators, system integrators.","Owner":"Network administrators, system integrators."},{"Description":"Internationalisation of power supply may introduce compatibility issues and safety risks.","Impact":"Electrical hazards, power supply malfunctions, and damage to the device.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing, compliance with international standards, and user education on safe power supply use.","Technologies":"International power standards, safety certifications, testing protocols.","People":"End users, installers, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Manufacturers, installers, maintenance providers."},{"Description":"Plug-and-play installation may lead to overlooking safety and environmental factors.","Impact":"Unsafe installations, environmental damage, and potential health hazards.","Mitigation":"Installation guidelines, safety training, and environmental impact assessment.","Technologies":"Installation checklists, safety guidelines, environmental impact assessment tools.","People":"Installers, maintenance personnel, environmental assessors.","Owner":"Manufacturers, maintenance providers, environmental assessors."}]}
